thruputs

Tag element width and height

Utility functions to change a tag element’s width or height. Widths and heights are specified as percentages of the parent object’s width or height.

Arguments

.tag

A tag element.

percentage

One of 25, 50, 75, or 100 specifying width or height as a percentage of a parent element’s width or height.

max

One of 25, 50, 75, or 100 specifying max width or max height as a percentage of a parent element’s width or height.

Getting started
